project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple contact book application allowing users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. Contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and interactions will occur through the terminal.

task.name: Implement feature to search for contacts
Implement feature to update existing contacts
Implement functionality to read/write contacts from/to a JSON file
Write tests for all implemented features
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
